scripts.publish-major: npm run build && git commit -am pre-publish-build && npm version major && npm publish && git push origin master && git push origin master --tags
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build && git commit -am pre-publish-build && npm version minor && npm publish && git push origin master && git push origin master --tags
scripts.publish-patch: npm run build && git commit -am pre-publish-build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push origin master && git push origin master --tags
